settings_preferences.general_alerts_apply_button_hints:
Lite Telemetry machines only support the following alerts:
Relocation, No Communication, and Maintenance Reminders.
settings_preferences.low_usage_alerts_apply_button_hints: Lite Telemetry machines support Low Usage alerts.
settings_preferences.general_alerts_subtitle: Receive an email if these alerts are triggered
settings_preferences.other_alerts_subtitle: Only available for certain customers. Please contact your sales rep for details.
settings_preferences.reported_location: Triggered if the machine reported a location that is outside the set radius of its home location. â„– Alert Radius(1 mile = 1.6 km)
settings_preferences.reported_usage: Triggered if the machine reported usage but the battery was not charged on that calendar day.
settings_preferences.reported_battery: Triggered if the machine reported its battery being plugged in for charging but not to completion.
settings_preferences.reported_charge_error: Triggered if a charger error is reported by the machine.
settings_preferences.low_usage_subtitle: Receive an email if a machine is used less than a chosen threshold
settings_preferences.set_value_to_lower: Set Value lower than what you consider low
settings_preferences.reported_impact_detected: Triggered if an impact detected is reported by the machine.
settings_preferences.reported_no_communication: Triggered if a machine has not communicated with the portal for the selected period.
settings_preferences.no_service_description: Triggered if a machine has not been serviced in the selected period.
settings_preferences.available_for_certain_customers: *Only available for certain customers. Please contact your sales rep for details.
settings_preferences.available_for_certain_models: *Only available for certain models. Please contact your sales rep for details.
settings_preferences.triggered_service_request: Triggered if a Service Request has been created or completed.
settings_preferences.triggered_automatic_battery_watering: Triggered when Automatic Battery Watering (ABW) Tank needs to be filled with distilled water.
settings_preferences.triggered_maintenance_reminder: Triggered if a machine reaches a threshold of cleaning hours.
settings_preferences.triggered_less_than_cleantime_goal_alert: Triggered if machine is not used for the expected daily duration.
